strapiPost.title: Willow Creek Women's Hospital Receives Excellence Award
strapiPost.content:
Press Ganey recognized Willow Creek Women's Hospital in Johnson as a 2022 Human Experience Guardian of Excellence Award for their performance in physician engagement.

  • For the girls: Dedicated exclusively to women's health needs, Willow Creek is a full-service facility that offers a range of services, including obstetrics, breast imaging, an OB/GYN emergency department, and a Level Illa NICU.
  • Trophy case: Before this award, Willow Creek was the first Arkansas hospital to be recognized as a baby-friendly birth facility, the first in the nation to earn VBAC Center of Excellence status, and is one of the few recipients of the Governor's Award for Performance Excellence.

Read the full story HERE.
